statements: DELETE FROM InventoryManagement WHERE product_id = 100 AND current_inventory < reorder_point
DELETE FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock < 10 AND reorder_point > 20
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM orders WHERE order_quantity < 10);
DELETE FROM ProductionStatus WHERE order_id = 100 AND completion_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 500 AND contact_person = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 101 AND current_inventory < 10;
